thread.title: ANC NGC: Delegates share their thoughts

title: ANC NGC: Delegates share their thoughts
text:
Nomalungelo Petela (47)
Buffalo City region, Eastern Cape
As an organisation, we have made progress with the Freedom Charter. I am particularly happy with the countryâ€™s social cohesion and integration. There is no longer the kind of discrimination we once lived under, even if there are parts of the country where there are issues. We must now really focus on economic policy because there are many people who are not working, especially our graduates.
Dagma Mamanyoha (53)
